named-query.name: FIND_ORDER_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT opi FROM OrderPaymentInstrumentImpl opi WHERE opi.guid = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_ORDER_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT_BY_ORDER_NUMBER_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT opi FROM OrderPaymentInstrumentImpl opi WHERE opi.orderNumber = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_ORDER_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT_BY_ORDER_NUMBER_AND_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT opi FROM OrderPaymentInstrumentImpl opi WHERE opi.orderNumber = ?1 AND opi.paymentInstrumentGuid = ?2

named-query.name: DELETE_ORDER_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT_BY_ORDER_NUMBER
named-query.query: DELETE FROM OrderPaymentInstrumentImpl opi WHERE opi.orderNumber = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_ORDER_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT_BY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT opi FROM OrderPaymentInstrumentImpl opi WHERE opi.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_CART_ORDER_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENTS_BY_CART_ORDER_ALL

named-query.name: DELETE_ALL_CART_ORDER_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENTS_BY_SHOPPING_CART_GUID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CartOrderPaymentInstrumentImpl copi WHERE copi.cartOrderUid IN ( SELECT co.uidPk FROM CartOrderImpl co WHERE co.shoppingCartGuidInternal = ?1 )
